title: SNP veterans break cover to warn against Nicola Sturgeon's bid for indyref2 next year
text:
Until recently it's been the issue that dare not speak its name … at least not in public. Whilst Nicola Sturgeon received not one but several standing ovations from her party’s impatient activists when she said that she intends to hold a second independence referendum next year, battle hardened veterans were shaking their heads in despair.

Their view was near-unanimous. "Holding an important vote like this in 2020 would be madness."

The anger of senior nationalists about their leader’s plans has been vented, thus far, below the radar. Some of this is for legal reasons but is also because of the SNP’s legendary internal discipline. However, with Ms Sturgeon’s bold assertion that she’ll hold indyref2...
